summary: This is a small fix for the Smithing perks for PerkUP as Bethesda reworked the number of \'hits\' required to level it.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small fix for the Smithing perks for PerkUP as Bethesda reworked the number of \'hits\' required to level it.

PerkUP by Slayerjerman - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9359

Just to tied People over till PerkUp is updated.
author: Nova Cameron
